description: It's your day, so seize it! Your schedule is filled from dawn 'til dusk with appointments, tasks, and events. Did you remember today's work deadline? Your four o'clock urban beekeeping class? Whatever you have planned, this handy pad will keep you on track and on point. A to-do list pad that breaks down the day for effective time management. Carpe Diem - or just Carpe Knock Knock Classic Pads! 6 x 9-Inches. 60 Sheets.
